item.description:
Dj Laloo & Dj Bailu are Guaranteed to keep you on your feet at NYE 2013 at Divas Lounge.

* Ball Drop at Midnight on the Screens
* Complimentary Champagne Toast at Midnight
* Dj Bailu & Dj Laloo Rocking the dance floor (Bollywood/Bhangra /Remixes)

Come celebrate NYE in style with friends and family

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WHEN:   December 31st, 2012
WHERE: Divas Lounge - 246 Elm St, Somerville, MA 02144 (DAVIS SQ)
TIME:     Doors open at 10:00pm for dance party. Please arrive early!

Plenty off Street parking & free parking lots right opposite.
Don't miss out!! Limited Tickets! We have been throwing dance parties for 8 years!!

Tix and more info at www.Generationdesi.com (Limited time Discount Tix)
item.name: GLITZ & GLAMOR 2013 - Boston's Longest Established Bhangra/Bollywood NYE Party!
